titles.title: MP491 O come all you faithful

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O come, all you faithful,
Joyful and triumphant,
O come now, O come now to Bethlehem;
Come and behold Him
Born the King of angels:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing, like angels,
Sing in exultation,
Sing, with the citizens of heaven above,
Glory to God
glory in the highest:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O come let us adore Him,
O come let us adore Him,
O come let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.
